title: Gear4Wear Watchface
summary: Load Gear Watchfaces onto your Android Wear watch.
description: With this app you can load all (WS/MW) Gear watchfaces from Gearfaces.com onto your Android Wear Watch.Hundreds of watchfaces available!Try it for free, if you like it, buy the license for unlimited usage.How does it work:=============1. Start the Android-Wear app on your mobile device and activate the Gear4Wear watchface and open the configuration screen to configure the watch.2. Use the browser in the configuration screen to select a watchface from GearFaces.com and install it directly on your Android Wear watch. Or select a previously downloaded watchface from your download folder.3. You can also select your own watch background image (Gallery or Camera), independent from the installed watchface.Currently this is only tested on a 320x320 Android Wear watch, it might not behave correctly on Android Wear watches with other resolutions.Please contact me if you have any remarks or suggestions for improvements.
descriptionHTML:
With this app you can load all (WS/MW) Gear watchfaces from Gearfaces.com onto your Android Wear Watch.

Hundreds of watchfaces available!

Try it for free, if you like it, buy the license for unlimited usage.

How does it work:
=============

1. Start the Android-Wear app on your mobile device and activate the Gear4Wear watchface and open the configuration screen to configure the watch.

2. Use the browser in the configuration screen to select a watchface from GearFaces.com and install it directly on your Android Wear watch. Or select a previously downloaded watchface from your download folder.

3. You can also select your own watch background image (Gallery or Camera), independent from the installed watchface.

Currently this is only tested on a 320x320 Android Wear watch, it might not behave correctly on Android Wear watches with other resolutions.

Please contact me if you have any remarks or suggestions for improvements.
